actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the benefit reduction which is presently provided for SSI recipients in certain long-term care institutions where such institutions do not meet applicable State-established standards.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to eliminate benefit reductions for SSI recipients living in long-term care institutions which do not meet State standards.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the benefit reduction which is presently provided for SSI recipients in certain long-term care institutions where such institutions do not meet applicable State-established standards.
